main event: A visual sighting of a metallic object similar to a normal aircraft was tracked on ground radar at Mt. Lemmon AFS, Arizona, on July 2, 1957.
interesting points: The observation lasted for approximately 54 minutes., The metallic object was tracked by ground radar., Internal causes were possibly suggested for the sighting., There was no physical evidence obtained., The sighting occurred in a mountainous area near Tucson, Arizona.
sighted object: metallic object resembling a normal aircraft
witness description: Limited investigation, no confirmed witnesses mentioned.
